table:
CREATE TABLE `edu_beneficiarios` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `created_by` int DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_by` int DEFAULT NULL,
  `updated_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `indexing_text` longtext COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `created_ip` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `nome` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `nascimento` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `cpf` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `cpf_img` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `rg` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `rg_img` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `orgao_exp` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `estado_civil` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `nome_pai` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `nome_mae` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `telefone` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `formacao` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `email` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `cargo` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `pis` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `pis_img` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `rede` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `uni_ens` int DEFAULT NULL,
  `cep` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `logradouro` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `numero` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `complemento` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `bairro` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `cidade` int DEFAULT NULL,
  `comp_end` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `comp_banco` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `tipo_conta` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `banco` int DEFAULT NULL,
  `agencia` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `conta_digito` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `pix` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `possui_cnh` int DEFAULT NULL,
  `data_cnh` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `cnh` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `estado` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `historico_benef` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `consultar_bene` text COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci,
  `baixar_arquivos` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `fb_filter_formacao_INDEX` (`formacao`(10)),
  KEY `fb_filter_estado_civil_INDEX` (`estado_civil`(10)),
  KEY `fb_filter_rede_INDEX` (`rede`(10)),
  KEY `fb_order_possui_cnh_INDEX` (`possui_cnh`),
  KEY `fb_order_nome_INDEX` (`nome`(10)),
  KEY `fb_order_cargo_INDEX` (`cargo`(10)),
  KEY `fb_order_uni_ens_INDEX` (`uni_ens`),
  KEY `fb_order_created_date_INDEX` (`created_date`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=952 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

email_message_text.2:
Prezado(a),

O cadastro do beneficiário {edu_beneficiarios___nome} foi realizado com sucesso!

 

 

*NÃO RESPONDA ESSE E-MAIL*
Esta é uma mensagem de e-mail automática enviada de nosso sistema!

listParams.search-all-label: Digite e tecle enter para pesquisar
